about_the_game:
A dynamic, arcade-style mayhem with customizable cute robots, where you use your arms and head to score the goal, sometimes punching the enemy. Hit both the ball and your enemy, dash around, challenge your reflex. Try your strengths in another modes (currently there's a volleyball mode to try).


Features:

- Multiplayer duels!
Play with your friends locally or online (players are the hosts)

- Arcade inspired mix of soccer and brawler
Punching the enemy can be not only satisfying, but also helpful to score the goal.

- Musical maps
You can feel the rhytm in this game. Beat-synchronized elements will help you to keep the flow.

- Bots customization
Fight others to unlock parts for your robot. You can also get some goods for your map side representation

- Easy to understand controls
With simple yet sensitive controls it's easy to learn, but hard to master.
